text: Pascal Morvillers (born 24 February 1956) is a French equestrian. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:French male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of France Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Somme (department)
title: Pascal Morvillers
